name: Dicey Guildkeeper
description:
Welcome to the Dicey Guildkeeper

In this game, you act as a dicey guildkeeper and need to send adventurers off on quests. Thinking is too tiresome and these adventurers will certainly be fine, so why not throw some dice to decide who goes on which quests.

Instructions

Dicey Guildkeeper is played primarily with the left-click on the mouse.

Click and drag upward from the back to draw dice.

Right click on dice to lock them. This prevents them from being rolled when the roll button is clicked.

Only locked dice will go on the quest so if you don't want some dice to go, don't lock them

You can decide to add dice to the pot later if you still have rolls left. If you do this, you must perform a roll if you want to lock the dice.

Formations

Adventurers use a 4 line formation. Shields in the front, then Swords, then Bows, then Healers. The enemy will always attack the front line, and in the order from left-to-right.

Notes
  • Linux fonts may be missing. The Box to the right of the hearts is meant to be an upside down dagger meant to indicate attack
  • Linux audio is delayed
